wikipedia_page.main: Mark Haysom  (born 1953) is a British former management executive.

response: Mark Haysom CBE, the second chief executive of the LSC, announced that he was stepping down from his role on 23 March 2009 - taking accountability as Chief Executive for difficulties that the LSC had encountered with a college (PFI) rebuilding programme.BBC Education | College funding fiasco boss quits He was replaced by Geoff Russell, formerly of accountants KPMG.
During its lifetime the LSC had three chief executives: John Harwood, Mark Haysom and Geoff Russell.
* Mark Haysom, Chief Executive, Learning and Skills Council for England. For services to Education and to Training.
*Mark Haysom CBE, newspaper executive, public servant, author
